attributes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing a token crowdsale,
allowing investors to purchase tokens with ether. This contract implements
such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional
functionality and/or custom behavior.
The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conform
the base architecture for crowdsales. They are *not* intended to be modified / overridden.
The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override
the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropriate to concatenate
behavior.
attributes.name: Crowdsale
TokenPurchase

attributes.documentation: @dev fallback function ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

@dev low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***
@param _beneficiary Address performing the token purchase
attributes.name: buyTokens
_preValidatePurchase
_postValidatePurchase
_deliverTokens
_processPurchase
_updatePurchasingState
_getTokenAmount

attributes.documentation: @dev Determines how ETH is stored/forwarded on purchases.
attributes.name: _forwardFunds

@dev Crowdsale accepting contributions only within a time frame.
attributes.name: TimedCrowdsale

attributes.documentation: @dev Reverts if not in crowdsale time range.

attributes.documentation:

work. Calls the contract's finalization function.

Escrow

attributes.documentation:
@dev Stores the sent amount as credit to be withdrawn.
@param _payee The destination address of the funds.
attributes.name: deposit

attributes.documentation:
@dev Withdraw accumulated balance for a payee.
@param _payee The address whose funds will be withdrawn and transferred to.
attributes.name: withdraw

attributes.documentation:
@title ConditionalEscrow
@dev Base abstract escrow to only allow withdrawal if a condition is met.
attributes.name: ConditionalEscrow
withdrawalAllowed
RefundEscrow

attributes.documentation:
@dev Constructor.
@param _beneficiary The beneficiary of the deposits.

@dev Stores funds that may later be refunded.
@param _refundee The address funds will be sent to if a refund occurs.
attributes.name: deposit

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows for the beneficiary to withdraw their funds, rejecting
further deposits.
attributes.name: close

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows for refunds to take place, rejecting further deposits.
attributes.name: enableRefunds

attributes.documentation: @dev Withdraws the beneficiary's funds.
attributes.name: beneficiaryWithdraw

attributes.documentation: @dev Returns whether refundees can withdraw their deposits (be refunded).
attributes.name: withdrawalAllowed
RefundableCrowdsale

attributes.documentation:
@dev Constructor, creates RefundEscrow.
@param _goal Funding goal
@dev Investors can claim refunds here if crowdsale is unsuccessful
attributes.name: claimRefund

attributes.documentation:
@dev Checks whether funding goal was reached.
@return Whether funding goal was reached
attributes.name: goalReached

attributes.documentation: @dev escrow finalization task, called when owner calls finalize()

attributes.documentation: @dev Overrides Crowdsale fund forwarding, sending funds to escrow.
attributes.name: _forwardFunds
